title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details have the following issues: 
a. Duplicate name validation could be performed on the first page.
b. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe the marking between the button and the list.
3. Observe the alignment of the top button with the dialog top.
4. Check if the first and second columns can be merged.
